mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lab_result_detail (document_id, result_date, test_name, result_value, unit, ref_low, ref_high, flag, notes) VALUES (#{documentId}, #{resultDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{testName}, #{resultValue}, #{unit}, #{refLow}, #{refHigh}, #{flag}, #{notes})

INSERT INTO lab_result_detail (document_id, result_date, test_name, result_value, unit, ref_low, ref_high, flag, notes) VALUES
(#{r.documentId}, #{r.resultDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{r.testName}, #{r.resultValue}, #{r.unit}, #{r.refLow}, #{r.refHigh}, #{r.flag}, #{r.notes})
mapper.select: SELECT id, document_id, result_date, test_name, result_value, unit, ref_low, ref_high, flag, notes FROM lab_result_detail WHERE document_id = #{documentId} ORDER BY COALESCE(result_date, '1970-01-01') DESC, id ASC

SELECT lrd.id, lrd.document_id, lrd.result_date, lrd.test_name, lrd.result_value, lrd.unit, lrd.ref_low, lrd.ref_high, lrd.flag, lrd.notes FROM lab_result_detail lrd JOIN medical_document md ON md.id = lrd.document_id WHERE md.doc_type = 'lab' AND md.visit_id = #{visitId} ORDER BY COALESCE(lrd.result_date, '1970-01-01') DESC, lrd.id ASC

SELECT lrd.id, lrd.document_id, lrd.result_date, lrd.test_name, lrd.result_value, lrd.unit, lrd.ref_low, lrd.ref_high, lrd.flag, lrd.notes FROM lab_result_detail lrd JOIN medical_document md ON md.id = lrd.document_id JOIN visit v ON v.id = md.visit_id WHERE md.doc_type = 'lab' AND v.pet_id = #{petId} ORDER BY COALESCE(lrd.result_date, '1970-01-01') DESC, lrd.id ASC
